note:
Coffee shop intellectual. IoT researcher. Amateur musician. Average gamer. Beginner standup comedian. I own the instance megalodon.social.

My name is Suryoday Basak and I'm a PhD candidate at Penn State, Computer Science and Engineering. My focus is on an overlap of wireless sensing, machine learning and security of upcoming wireless technologies.

Other than that, I'm interested in many topics in science, tech, and DIY, and I play the guitar in my spare time.

fields.name: Research Interests
fields.value: internet of things (IoT), wireless sensing, wireless communication, artificial intelligence, machine learning, deep learning, automatic speech recognition, ubiquitous computing, cybersecurity, cyberphysical security, numerical optimization
